title: REGGAE SUNSPLASH 1979 | Documentary with concert footage
description:
This documentary is one of these underground motion pictures which are brilliant yet hard to find. Recorded in 1979 this movie shows live takes from the Montego Bay Sunsplash, presenting Burning Spear, Bob Marley and the Wailers, Peter Tosh and Third World.

Alongside the concert clips are a stash of artists interviews and snippets showing the environmental setting of jamaican music culture. This makes Ã¢â‚¬Å“Reggae by BusÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½  a serious piece of roots reggae documentaries.
